channel.name: To California OUT SFTP
channel.description: 2023-09-27 JER - MP-44: Modified the [Evaluate ResultSets Delete Not Detected or Disallowed Observations] Source transformer by comment out the filterNotifiablePathogensNonDetectable within the detectedOnlyNotifiablePathogens and use two lists: detectedOnlyNotifiablePathogens & detectALLNotifiablePathogens 2023-06-06 JER - MP-39: Preparatory activity to remove destination connectors new CDPH SFTP endpoint both Stage (non-Prod) and Prod connectors 2023-05-15 JER - MP-39: Modify to create a SOAP-WS Destination Connector https://saphiresoap.cdph.ca.gov/services/HL7SOAPEndPointSvc replacing the SFTP Destination Connector preferred by CalREDDIE ELR reporting 2023-03-14 JER - MP-27: Modify to deploy this channel to filter all non-COVID Vagnitis Panel except the panel pathogens with Detected value. 2023-03-08 JER - MP:22 Clone of To Tennessee OUT SFTP

order_type
entered_location_state
collected_date
